name: Ledyba
flavorText:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.

previous.name: Noctowl
previous.flavorText:
Its eyes are
specially adapted.
They concentrate even faint light
and enable it to
see in the dark.

next.name: Ledian
next.flavorText:
When the stars
flicker in the
night sky, it flutters about,
scattering a
glowing powder.
